AuthHandler - interface se.bricole.xss.server.AuthHandler.
A regular AuthHandler (also called "Authenticator" elsewhere in the documentation).
AuthHandlerPassive - interface se.bricole.xss.server.AuthHandlerPassive.
This passive AuthHandler also specifies a method of retreiving the password for a specific user, letting the server handle the authentication process (thus allowing use of MD5 authentication implemented in XSS).
